exec git init
exec lefthook install

exec lefthook dump
cmp stdout lefthook-dump.yml

-- lefthook.yml --
remote:
  git_url: https://github.com/evilmartians/lefthook
  config: examples/with_scripts/lefthook.yml

-- lefthook-dump.yml --
pre-commit:
  scripts:
    good_job.js:
      runner: node
remote:
  config: examples/with_scripts/lefthook.yml
  git_url: https://github.com/evilmartians/lefthook
